result.title: Code Monk(Checkpoint III)
result.content:
Hello everyone,

I want to invite you to participate in HackerEarth's Code Monk(CheckPoint III) contest which covers all the topics earlier covered in Code Monk. It is a 3 hour long contest scheduled on 3rd May 2017 at 21:00 IST. To check your timezone, click here.

The contest link is Code Monk(Checkpoint III). Please register yourself before the contest and do participate.

Please note that the contest is RATED.

The problem set consists of 6 algorithmic tasks with partial solutions allowed â€” you get points for every test that your solution passes. The problem set has been prepared by me. The tester as well as the editorialist of the contest is imamit. The problem set is well balanced and covers all the topics in depth.

Also, top 3 newbie winners to get HackerEarth T-shirts in each Code Monk challenge!

Good luck everyone! See you on the leaderboard. :)

UPD: Contest is about to start in 5 minutes.
